explains: n. 顾客群，客户群；（总称）委托人

sentences.en: We cater to an exclusive clientele.
sentences.cn: 我们满足一个特殊客户群的需求。

sentences.en: This pub had a mixed clientele.
sentences.cn: 这家酒吧有混杂的顾客群。

sentences.en: A district should serve its clientele, namely students, staff, and parents.
sentences.cn: 一个学区应该服务于其主顾，即学生、教职员工和家长。
